verses.verse: Then <WH227> Solomon <WH8010> assembled <WH6950> <WH853> the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> and <WH853> all <WH3605> the heads <WH7218> of the tribes, <WH4294> the chief <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> unto <WH413> king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> that they might bring up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> out of the city <WH4480> <WH5892> of David, <WH1732> which <WH1931> is Zion. <WH6726>

And all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> assembled themselves <WH6950> unto <WH413> king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> at the feast <WH2282> in the month <WH3391> Ethanim, <WH388> which <WH1931> is the seventh <WH7637> month. <WH2320>
And all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came, <WH935> and the priests <WH3548> took up <WH5375> <WH853> the ark. <WH727>

And they brought up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and all <WH3605> the holy <WH6944> vessels <WH3627> that <WH834> were in the tabernacle, <WH168> even those did the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> bring up. <WH5927>

And king <WH4428> Solomon, <WH8010> and all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of Israel, <WH3478> that were assembled <WH3259> unto <WH5921> him, were with <WH854> him before <WH6440> the ark, <WH727> sacrificing <WH2076> sheep <WH6629> and oxen, <WH1241> that <WH834> could not <WH3808> be told <WH5608> nor <WH3808> numbered <WH4487> for multitude. <WH4480> <WH7230>

And the priests <WH3548> brought in <WH935> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> unto <WH413> his place, <WH4725> into <WH413> the oracle <WH1687> of the house, <WH1004> to <WH413> the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place, even under <WH413> <WH8478> the wings <WH3671> of the cherubims. <WH3742>

For <WH3588> the cherubims <WH3742> spread forth <WH6566> their two wings <WH3671> over <WH413> the place <WH4725> of the ark, <WH727> and the cherubims <WH3742> covered <WH5526> <WH5921> the ark <WH727> and the staves <WH905> thereof above. <WH4480> <WH4605>

And they drew out <WH748> the staves, <WH905> that the ends <WH7218> of the staves <WH905> were seen <WH7200> out <WH4480> in the holy <WH6944> place before <WH5921> <WH6440> the oracle, <WH1687> and they were not <WH3808> seen <WH7200> without: <WH2351> and there <WH8033> they are <WH1961> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

There was nothing <WH369> in the ark <WH727> save <WH7535> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> put <WH5117> there <WH8033> at Horeb, <WH2722> when <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH3772> a covenant with <WH5973> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> when they came out <WH3318> of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when the priests <WH3548> were come out <WH3318> of <WH4480> the holy <WH6944> place, that the cloud <WH6051> filled <WH4390> <WH853> the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068>

So that the priests <WH3548> could <WH3201> not <WH3808> stand <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the cloud: <WH6051> for <WH3588> the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> had filled <WH4390> <WH853> the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>
Then <WH227> spoke <WH559> Solomon, <WH8010> The LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> that he would dwell <WH7931> in the thick darkness. <WH6205>
I have surely built <WH1129> <WH1129> thee a house <WH1004> to dwell in, <WH2073> a settled place <WH4349> for thee to abide in <WH3427> forever. <WH5769>

And the king <WH4428> turned <WH5437> <WH853> his face <WH6440> about, and blessed <WH1288> <WH853> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH6951> of Israel: <WH3478> (and all <WH3605> the congregation <WH6951> of Israel <WH3478> stood;) <WH5975>

And he said, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> spoke <WH1696> with his mouth <WH6310> unto <WH854> David <WH1732> my father, <WH1> and hath with his hand <WH3027> fulfilled <WH4390> it, saying, <WH559>

Since <WH4480> the day <WH3117> that <WH834> I brought forth <WH3318> <WH853> my people <WH5971> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> I chose <WH977> no <WH3808> city <WH5892> out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to build <WH1129> a house, <WH1004> that my name <WH8034> might be <WH1961> therein; <WH8033> but I chose <WH977> David <WH1732> to be <WH1961> over <WH5921> my people <WH5971> Israel. <WH3478>
And it was <WH1961> in <WH5973> the heart <WH3824> of David <WH1732> my father <WH1> to build <WH1129> a house <WH1004> for the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> David <WH1732> my father, <WH1> Whereas <WH3282> <WH834> it was <WH1961> in <WH5973> thine heart <WH3824> to build <WH1129> a house <WH1004> unto my name, <WH8034> thou didst well <WH2895> that <WH3588> it was <WH1961> in <WH5973> thine heart. <WH3824>

Nevertheless <WH7535> thou <WH859> shalt not <WH3808> build <WH1129> the house; <WH1004> but <WH3588> <WH518> thy son <WH1121> that shall come forth <WH3318> out of thy loins, <WH4480> <WH2504> he <WH1931> shall build <WH1129> the house <WH1004> unto my name. <WH8034>

And the LORD <WH3068> hath performed <WH6965> <WH853> his word <WH1697> that <WH834> he spoke, <WH1696> and I am risen up <WH6965> in the room <WH8478> of David <WH1732> my father, <WH1> and sit <WH3427> on <WH5921> the throne <WH3678> of Israel, <WH3478> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> promised, <WH1696> and have built <WH1129> a house <WH1004> for the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>

And I have set <WH7760> there <WH8033> a place <WH4725> for the ark, <WH727> wherein <WH834> <WH8033> is the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with <WH5973> our fathers, <WH1> when he brought them out <WH3318> <WH853> of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And Solomon <WH8010> stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> in the presence <WH5048> of all <WH3605> the congregation <WH6951> of Israel, <WH3478> and spread forth <WH6566> his hands <WH3709> toward heaven: <WH8064>

And he said, <WH559> LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> there is no <WH369> God <WH430> like thee, <WH3644> in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4480> <WH4605> or on <WH5921> earth <WH776> beneath, <WH4480> <WH8478> who keepest <WH8104> covenant <WH1285> and mercy <WH2617> with thy servants <WH5650> that walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> thee with all <WH3605> their heart: <WH3820>

Who <WH834> hast kept <WH8104> with thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> my father <WH1> <WH853> that <WH834> thou promisedst <WH1696> him: thou spakest <WH1696> also with thy mouth, <WH6310> and hast fulfilled <WH4390> it with thine hand, <WH3027> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Therefore now, <WH6258> LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> keep <WH8104> with thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> my father <WH1> <WH853> that <WH834> thou promisedst <WH1696> him, saying, <WH559> There shall not <WH3808> fail <WH3772> thee a man <WH376> in my sight <WH4480> <WH6440> to sit <WH3427> on <WH5921> the throne <WH3678> of Israel; <WH3478> so <WH7535> that <WH518> thy children <WH1121> take heed to <WH8104> <WH853> their way, <WH1870> that they walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> me as <WH834> thou hast walked <WH1980> before <WH6440> me.

And now, <WH6258> O God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> let thy word, <WH1697> I pray thee, <WH4994> be verified, <WH539> which <WH834> thou spakest <WH1696> unto thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> my father. <WH1>

But <WH3588> will God <WH430> indeed <WH552> dwell <WH3427> on <WH5921> the earth? <WH776> behold, <WH2009> the heaven <WH8064> and heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064> cannot <WH3808> contain <WH3557> thee; how much less <WH637> <WH3588> this <WH2088> house <WH1004> that <WH834> I have built? <WH1129>

Yet have thou respect <WH6437> unto <WH413> the prayer <WH8605> of thy servant, <WH5650> and to <WH413> his supplication, <WH8467> O LORD <WH3068> my God, <WH430> to hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> the cry <WH7440> and to <WH413> the prayer, <WH8605> which <WH834> thy servant <WH5650> prayeth <WH6419> before <WH6440> thee today: <WH3117>

That thine eyes <WH5869> may be <WH1961> open <WH6605> toward <WH413> this <WH2088> house <WH1004> night <WH3915> and day, <WH3117> even toward <WH413> the place <WH4725> of which <WH834> thou hast said, <WH559> My name <WH8034> shall be <WH1961> there: <WH8033> that thou mayest hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> the prayer <WH8605> which <WH834> thy servant <WH5650> shall make <WH6419> toward <WH413> this <WH2088> place. <WH4725>

And hearken <WH8085> thou to <WH413> the supplication <WH8467> of thy servant, <WH5650> and of thy people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> when <WH834> they shall pray <WH6419> toward <WH413> this <WH2088> place: <WH4725> and hear <WH8085> thou <WH859> in <WH413> heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> place: <WH4725> and when thou hearest, <WH8085> forgive. <WH5545>

<WH853> If <WH834> any man <WH376> trespass <WH2398> against his neighbor, <WH7453> and an oath <WH423> be laid <WH5377> upon him to cause him to swear, <WH422> and the oath <WH422> come <WH935> before <WH6440> thine altar <WH4196> in this <WH2088> house: <WH1004>

Then hear <WH8085> thou <WH859> in heaven, <WH8064> and do, <WH6213> and judge <WH8199> <WH853> thy servants, <WH5650> condemning <WH7561> the wicked, <WH7563> to bring <WH5414> his way <WH1870> upon his head; <WH7218> and justifying <WH6663> the righteous, <WH6662> to give <WH5414> him according to his righteousness. <WH6666>

When thy people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> be smitten down <WH5062> before <WH6440> the enemy, <WH341> because <WH834> they have sinned <WH2398> against thee, and shall turn again <WH7725> to <WH413> thee, and confess <WH3034> <WH853> thy name, <WH8034> and pray, <WH6419> and make supplication <WH2603> unto <WH413> thee in this <WH2088> house: <WH1004>

Then hear <WH8085> thou <WH859> in heaven, <WH8064> and forgive <WH5545> the sin <WH2403> of thy people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and bring them again <WH7725> unto <WH413> the land <WH127> which <WH834> thou gavest <WH5414> unto their fathers. <WH1>

When heaven <WH8064> is shut up, <WH6113> and there is <WH1961> no <WH3808> rain, <WH4306> because <WH3588> they have sinned <WH2398> against thee; if they pray <WH6419> toward <WH413> this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> and confess <WH3034> <WH853> thy name, <WH8034> and turn <WH7725> from their sin, <WH4480> <WH2403> when <WH3588> thou afflictest <WH6031> them:

Then hear <WH8085> thou <WH859> in heaven, <WH8064> and forgive <WH5545> the sin <WH2403> of thy servants, <WH5650> and of thy people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> that <WH3588> thou teach <WH3384> them <WH853> the <WH834> good <WH2896> way <WH1870> wherein they should walk, <WH1980> and give <WH5414> rain <WH4306> upon <WH5921> thy land, <WH776> which <WH834> thou hast given <WH5414> to thy people <WH5971> for an inheritance. <WH5159>

If <WH3588> there be <WH1961> in the land <WH776> famine, <WH7458> if <WH3588> there be <WH1961> pestilence, <WH1698> blasting, <WH7711> mildew, <WH3420> locust, <WH697> or if <WH3588> there be <WH1961> caterpillar; <WH2625> if <WH3588> their enemy <WH341> besiege <WH6887> them in the land <WH776> of their cities; <WH8179> whatsoever <WH3605> plague, <WH5061> whatsoever <WH3605> sickness <WH4245> there be;

What <WH3605> prayer <WH8605> and supplication <WH8467> soever <WH3605> <WH834> be <WH1961> made by any <WH3605> man, <WH120> or by all <WH3605> thy people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> shall know <WH3045> every man <WH376> the plague <WH5061> of his own heart, <WH3824> and spread forth <WH6566> his hands <WH3709> toward <WH413> this <WH2088> house: <WH1004>

Then hear <WH8085> thou <WH859> in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> place, <WH4349> and forgive, <WH5545> and do, <WH6213> and give <WH5414> to every man <WH376> according to <WH3605> his ways, <WH1870> whose <WH834> <WH853> heart <WH3824> thou knowest; <WH3045> (for <WH3588> thou, <WH859> even thou only, <WH905> knowest <WH3045> <WH853> the hearts <WH3824> of all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of men;) <WH120>

That <WH4616> they may fear <WH3372> thee all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> that <WH834> they <WH1992> live <WH2416> in <WH5921> <WH6440> the land <WH127> which <WH834> thou gavest <WH5414> unto our fathers. <WH1>

Moreover <WH1571> concerning <WH413> a stranger, <WH5237> that <WH834> is not <WH3808> of thy people <WH4480> <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> but cometh <WH935> out of a far country <WH4480> <WH776> <WH7350> for thy name's sake; <WH4616> <WH8034>

(For <WH3588> they shall hear of <WH8085> <WH853> thy great <WH1419> name, <WH8034> and of thy strong <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and of thy stretched out <WH5186> arm;) <WH2220> when he shall come <WH935> and pray <WH6419> toward <WH413> this <WH2088> house; <WH1004>

Hear <WH8085> thou <WH859> in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> place, <WH4349> and do <WH6213> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> the stranger <WH5237> calleth <WH7121> to <WH413> thee for: that <WH4616> all <WH3605> people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> may know <WH3045> <WH853> thy name, <WH8034> to fear <WH3372> thee, as do thy people <WH5971> Israel; <WH3478> and that they may know <WH3045> that <WH3588> this <WH2088> house, <WH1004> which <WH834> I have built, <WH1129> is called <WH7121> by <WH5921> thy name. <WH8034>

If <WH3588> thy people <WH5971> go out <WH3318> to battle <WH4421> against <WH5921> their enemy, <WH341> whithersoever <WH1870> <WH834> thou shalt send <WH7971> them, and shall pray <WH6419> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> toward <WH1870> the city <WH5892> which <WH834> thou hast chosen, <WH977> and toward the house <WH1004> that <WH834> I have built <WH1129> for thy name: <WH8034>
Then hear <WH8085> thou in heaven <WH8064> <WH853> their prayer <WH8605> and their supplication, <WH8467> and maintain <WH6213> their cause. <WH4941>

If <WH3588> they sin <WH2398> against thee, (for <WH3588> there is no <WH369> man <WH120> that <WH834> sinneth <WH2398> not,) <WH3808> and thou be angry <WH599> with them, and deliver <WH5414> them to <WH6440> the enemy, <WH341> so that they carry them away <WH7617> captives <WH7617> unto <WH413> the land <WH776> of the enemy, <WH341> far <WH7350> or <WH176> near; <WH7138>

Yet if they shall bethink themselves <WH7725> <WH413> <WH3820> in the land <WH776> whither <WH834> <WH8033> they were carried captives, <WH7617> and repent, <WH7725> and make supplication <WH2603> unto <WH413> thee in the land <WH776> of them that carried them captives, <WH7617> saying, <WH559> We have sinned, <WH2398> and have done perversely, <WH5753> we have committed wickedness; <WH7561>

And so return <WH7725> unto <WH413> thee with all <WH3605> their heart, <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> their soul, <WH5315> in the land <WH776> of their enemies, <WH341> which <WH834> led them away captive, <WH7617> <WH853> and pray <WH6419> unto <WH413> thee toward <WH1870> their land, <WH776> which <WH834> thou gavest <WH5414> unto their fathers, <WH1> the city <WH5892> which <WH834> thou hast chosen, <WH977> and the house <WH1004> which <WH834> I have built <WH1129> for thy name: <WH8034>
Then hear <WH8085> thou <WH853> their prayer <WH8605> and their supplication <WH8467> in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> place, <WH4349> and maintain <WH6213> their cause, <WH4941>

And forgive <WH5545> thy people <WH5971> that <WH834> have sinned <WH2398> against thee, and all <WH3605> their transgressions <WH6588> wherein <WH834> they have transgressed <WH6586> against thee, and give <WH5414> them compassion <WH7356> before <WH6440> them who carried them captive, <WH7617> that they may have compassion on <WH7355> them:

For <WH3588> they <WH1992> be thy people, <WH5971> and thine inheritance, <WH5159> which <WH834> thou broughtest forth <WH3318> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> from the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the furnace <WH3564> of iron: <WH1270>

That thine eyes <WH5869> may be <WH1961> open <WH6605> unto <WH413> the supplication <WH8467> of thy servant, <WH5650> and unto <WH413> the supplication <WH8467> of thy people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> to hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> them in all <WH3605> that they call <WH7121> for unto <WH413> thee.

For <WH3588> thou <WH859> didst separate <WH914> them from among all <WH4480> <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the earth, <WH776> to be thine inheritance, <WH5159> as <WH834> thou spakest <WH1696> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> thy servant, <WH5650> when thou broughtest <WH3318> <WH853> our fathers <WH1> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> O Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3068>

And it was <WH1961> so, that when Solomon <WH8010> had made an end <WH3615> of praying <WH6419> <WH853> all <WH3605> this <WH2063> prayer <WH8605> and supplication <WH8467> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> he arose <WH6965> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of the LORD, <WH3068> from kneeling <WH4480> <WH3766> on <WH5921> his knees <WH1290> with his hands <WH3709> spread up <WH6566> to heaven. <WH8064>
And he stood, <WH5975> and blessed <WH1288> <WH853> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH6951> of Israel <WH3478> with a loud <WH1419> voice, <WH6963> saying, <WH559>

Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD, <WH3068> that <WH834> hath given <WH5414> rest <WH4496> unto his people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> he promised: <WH1696> there hath not <WH3808> failed <WH5307> one <WH259> word <WH1697> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> his good <WH2896> promise, <WH1697> which <WH834> he promised <WH1696> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> his servant. <WH5650>
The LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> be <WH1961> with <WH5973> us, as <WH834> he was <WH1961> with <WH5973> our fathers: <WH1> let him not <WH408> leave <WH5800> us, nor <WH408> forsake <WH5203> us:

That he may incline <WH5186> our hearts <WH3824> unto <WH413> him, to walk <WH1980> in all <WH3605> his ways, <WH1870> and to keep <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> and his statutes, <WH2706> and his judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> <WH853> our fathers. <WH1>

And let these <WH428> my words, <WH1697> wherewith <WH834> I have made supplication <WH2603> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> be <WH1961> nigh <WH7138> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> day <WH3119> and night, <WH3915> that he maintain <WH6213> the cause <WH4941> of his servant, <WH5650> and the cause <WH4941> of his people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> at all times, <WH3117> as the matter <WH1697> shall require: <WH3117>
That <WH4616> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> may know <WH3045> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> is God, <WH430> and that there is none <WH369> else. <WH5750>

Let your heart <WH3824> therefore be <WH1961> perfect <WH8003> with <WH5973> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> to walk <WH1980> in his statutes, <WH2706> and to keep <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> as at this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
And the king, <WH4428> and all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> with <WH5973> him, offered <WH2076> sacrifice <WH2077> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And Solomon <WH8010> offered <WH2076> <WH853> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> which <WH834> he offered <WH2076> unto the LORD, <WH3068> two <WH8147> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> oxen, <WH1241> and a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> sheep. <WH6629> So the king <WH4428> and all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> dedicated <WH2596> <WH853> the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

The same <WH1931> day <WH3117> did the king <WH4428> hallow <WH6942> <WH853> the middle <WH8432> of the court <WH2691> that <WH834> was before <WH6440> the house <WH1004> of the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> there <WH8033> he offered <WH6213> <WH853> burnt offerings, <WH5930> and meat offerings, <WH4503> and the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings: <WH8002> because <WH3588> the brazen <WH5178> altar <WH4196> that <WH834> was before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> was too little <WH6996> to receive <WH4480> <WH3557> <WH853> the burnt offerings, <WH5930> and meat offerings, <WH4503> and the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings. <WH8002>

And at that <WH1931> time <WH6256> Solomon <WH8010> held <WH6213> <WH853> a feast, <WH2282> and all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> with <WH5973> him, a great <WH1419> congregation, <WH6951> from the entering in <WH4480> <WH935> of Hamath <WH2574> unto <WH5704> the river <WH5158> of Egypt, <WH4714> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> and seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> even fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> days. <WH3117>

On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> he sent <WH7971> <WH853> the people <WH5971> away: and they blessed <WH1288> <WH853> the king, <WH4428> and went <WH1980> unto their tents <WH168> joyful <WH8056> and glad <WH2896> of heart <WH3820> for <WH5921> all <WH3605> the goodness <WH2896> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had done <WH6213> for David <WH1732> his servant, <WH5650> and for Israel <WH3478> his people. <WH5971>
